summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 3.6°C) and feels like temperature (down 1.9°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 10%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 274 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 22 miles), cloud levels (up 496 m), and outside temperature (up 3.2°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, humidity should not be a concern and gentle light winds are expected. Drizzle or light rain possible, low clouds are expected, possibly some fog or persistent clouds, and it’s dim outside. Weather could become unsettled.
